alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 5:32PM CDT until May 15 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Fulton County in western Kentucky... Hickman County in western Kentucky... Carlisle County in western Kentucky... Southeastern Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 532 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Towosahgy State Historic Site, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Clinton around 550 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bardwell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
